professional_summary.title: Full Stack Developer
professional_summary.tagline: Building production-ready SaaS applications serving thousands of users
professional_summary.summary: Full Stack Developer with 4+ years of experience building production-ready SaaS applications serving thousands of users. Expert in modern web technologies including Next.js, React, TypeScript, and Node.js with strong backend skills in PostgreSQL, Redis, and cloud infrastructure (AWS, Cloudflare). Proven track record of shipping 6+ live SaaS products from concept to deployment, including email validation APIs, job platforms, and AI-powered content tools.
key_achievements: Shipped 6+ production SaaS applications with active user bases
Built email validation API achieving 99%+ accuracy
Published 4 Chrome extensions on Chrome Web Store
Led development teams with Agile/Scrum methodologies
Expertise in microservices architecture with Docker and AWS

work_experience.title: Full Stack Developer
responsibilities: Designed, developed, and deployed 3 production-grade SaaS applications using Next.js 15, TypeScript, tRPC, and PostgreSQL
Built VerifyForge, an email validation API achieving 99%+ accuracy with real-time SMTP verification in <2s
Developed Real Jobs From Anywhere, a remote job platform aggregating 5,000+ active job listings with BullMQ
Created FinderLaunch, a product discovery platform curating 988+ projects with Dodo Payments integration
Implemented scalable microservices using Docker, AWS Lambda, and Cloudflare Workers
Conducted code reviews and maintained high code quality standards through PR-based workflows

work_experience.title: Chief Technology Officer
responsibilities: Led a team of 3 developers, conducting code reviews and mentoring junior developers on best practices
Designed AI-powered content platform with LLM integration and vector databases for RAG
Implemented custom vectorization pipeline with Supabase GTE for document processing (PDF, DOCX, TXT)
Deployed scalable microservices using AWS (Lambda, ECS, S3) and Cloudflare Workers
Established Agile workflows with sprint planning, daily standups, and retrospectives

work_experience.title: Full Stack Developer
responsibilities: Built video transcription tool with multi-language translation and various export formats
Designed backend API using Express.js with Redis caching for improved performance

work_experience.title: CTO & Co-Founder
responsibilities: Developed SEO tools and data-driven solutions using Python and Node.js
Built cloud infrastructure with AWS EC2 and S3; published 4 Chrome extensions

work_experience.title: Founder & Technical Lead
responsibilities: Provided SEO consultancy and built responsive web applications
Implemented SEO optimization strategies improving organic traffic

featured.name: VerifyForge
featured.description: Production-ready Email Validation API SaaS platform with hybrid validation achieving 99%+ accuracy. Features real-time SMTP verification, disposable detection, and comprehensive dashboard with subscription management.

featured.name: Real Jobs From Anywhere
featured.description: Remote job platform connecting global job seekers with curated opportunities from leading companies. Features advanced filtering, company profiles, and real-time job aggregation from multiple sources.

featured.name: FinderLaunch
featured.description: Product discovery and launch platform for makers and founders. Curates 988+ open-source projects with community voting, product showcases, and comprehensive launch tools for indie hackers.

featured.name: Semantic Pen
featured.description: AI content platform with advanced LLM integration and intelligent page parsing for high-quality content generation.

featured.name: YouTube Transcript Generator
featured.description: Tool for generating transcripts from YouTube videos with multi-language translation and various export formats.

python_tools.name: Semantic Interlinker
python_tools.description: Professional tool for discovering internal linking opportunities using semantic analysis and BERT embeddings. Analyzes web pages to identify semantically related content and suggest strategic linking opportunities.

python_tools.name: PAA Scraper
python_tools.description: Professional Python tool for extracting 'People Also Ask' questions from Google search results. Features CLI interface, REST API, batch processing, and Docker support for easy integration.

python_tools.name: WordPress Article Uploader
python_tools.description: Automated WordPress article uploader with NLP-based tag generation. Upload DOCX files to WordPress sites with intelligent title processing, multi-site support, and comprehensive logging.

python_tools.name: URL to Screenshot
python_tools.description: FastAPI service capturing high-quality screenshots of any URL using Python and Selenium.

common_application_questions.why_software: I love the process of transforming complex problems into elegant, scalable solutions that impact real users. There's immense satisfaction in architecting systems from scratch - whether it's building a real-time email validation API handling millions of requests or creating multi-agent workflows. The challenge of balancing performance, scalability, and user experience while shipping fast is what drives me.
common_application_questions.best_achievement: Built and shipped 6+ production SaaS applications from scratch. Most notably, VerifyForge - an email validation API serving real users with 99%+ accuracy and sub-2s response times. Architected the entire stack using Next.js, tRPC, PostgreSQL, Redis, and BullMQ - handling real-time SMTP verification at scale.
common_application_questions.biggest_technical_challenge: Building a RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) system for SemanticPen with 10k+ users. The challenge was implementing semantic search with pgvector, designing optimal chunking strategies (1000-char overlapping windows), and ensuring <3s first-token latency while maintaining factual accuracy. Solved it by optimizing vector similarity thresholds, implementing smart caching, and using sentence transformers for embeddings.
common_application_questions.leadership_experience: As CTO at Semantic Pen, led a team of 3 developers, conducted code reviews, mentored junior developers, and established Agile workflows with sprint planning and daily standups. Made architectural decisions, managed cloud infrastructure (AWS, Cloudflare), and shipped features on tight deadlines.
common_application_questions.why_join: I'm passionate about building products that solve real problems at scale. I thrive in fast-paced environments where I can own features end-to-end, make architectural decisions, and ship quickly. I'm looking for a team that values clean code, scalable architecture, and user impact.
common_application_questions.relocation: Open to relocation for the right opportunity, but prefer remote-first
common_application_questions.work_authorization: Indian citizen, may require visa sponsorship for non-remote roles outside India

strengths: Full-stack expertise across modern web technologies
Proven ability to ship production SaaS applications
Experience with AI/ML integration (LLMs, RAG, vector databases)
Excellent at balancing speed with code quality
